    • Constructor Detail

      • LudoGame

        public LudoGame()
        Default constructor for LudoModel. Initializes random number generator, sets up the board, creates the players, and sets the current player to RED.

    • Method Detail

      • setUpBoard

        public final void setUpBoard()
        This method creates the board and sets the starting positions of the game pieces.

      • rollDice

        public final int rollDice()
        This method simulates rolling a dice.
        Returns:
        The random integer representing the dice roll

      • nextPlayerTurn

        public final int nextPlayerTurn()
        This method advances the player counter and returns current player.
        Returns:
        The new current player

      • move

        public final boolean move(int oldPos,
                          int diceRoll)
        This method moves a piece from oldPos to newPos if it is a valid move.
        Parameters:
        oldPos - The current position of the piece
        diceRoll - The number of squares the move is supposed to be
        Returns:
        True if the move was successful, false if it failed

      • validMove

        private boolean validMove(int oldPos,
                          int newPos,
                          int diceRoll)
        Check if all Ludo rules are satisfied before moving.
        Parameters:
        oldPos - the old position we are attempting to move from
        newPos - the new position we are attempting to move to
        diceRoll - the number of positions to move forward
        Returns:
        boolean true if can't move, false if can move

      • isOccupied

        private boolean isOccupied(int oldPos,
                           int newPos)
        Check if the new position is occupied.
        Parameters:
        oldPos - the old position we are attempting to move from
        newPos - the new position we are attempting to move to
        Returns:
        boolean true if can't move, false if can move

      • isValidStart

        private boolean isValidStart(int oldPos,
                             int newPos,
                             int diceRoll)
        Checks if valid move from start position.
        Parameters:
        oldPos - the position you are moving from
        newPos - the position you are moving to
        diceRoll - the role of the dice
        Returns:
        if the move is a valid start move

      • cantMove

        private boolean cantMove(int oldPos,
                         int newPos,
                         int diceRoll)
        Check if a player can't move piece.
        Parameters:
        oldPos - the old position we are attempting to move from
        newPos - the new position we are attempting to move to
        diceRoll - the number of positions to move forward
        Returns:
        boolean, true if can't move, false if can move

        public final Player getPlayer(int playerNumber)
        A getter for a player, player number must be between 0 and 3.

        Returns:
        The player
